verbose_text: Another cause of the observed phenomenon might have been found in this kind of studies, namely a decrease in cortisol concentration [XREF_BIBR], suppressing among others secretion of vasopressin, which increases reversible resorption of water in kidneys.
evidence: cortisol concentration [ XREF_BIBR ], suppressing among others secretion of vasopressin, which increases reversible resorption of water
